content: this legal text provides a summary of a case titled vsc sklep cp 312021 the case involves a plaintiff who filed a lawsuit against a defendant in the first instance judgment the plaintiff was ordered to pay the defendant a sum of 305331 eur as the cost of the procedure the final resolution of the case grants the plaintiff the right to inherit certain assets including a real estate property a credit from trr bank nlb dd a car and a motorcycle the court appeal was dismissed upholding the original judgment the court used the inheritance act to make their decision the court noted that no witnesses testified about the emotional and moral connection between the plaintiff and the deceased except for one witness who testified that they were close the applicant is ordered to pay the defendant a sum of eur 76500 within 15 days the court also dismissed the applicants claim for reimbursement of legal costs the court of second instance reviewed the judgment and found flaws in the reasoning and assessment of evidence they agreed with the dismissal of the applicants claim and concluded that there was not enough evidence to prove a strong emotional and moral support between the applicant and the deceased the court made a decision in the first instance finding that the applicant did not provide enough evidence to prove a cohabitation relationship the court of appeal upheld the judgment of the court of first instance dismissing the appeal the appellant has been ordered to bear the costs of the appeal proceedings and reimburse the defendant for their costs the case involves a deceased person and their alleged cohabitation with the applicant since 2013 the appellant presents evidence of their intimate relationship shared finances and social activities
